childrens.title: Professor Han created spreadsheets to calculate the farm's irrigation needs ____
childrens.answers: ["dominantly","precisely","relatively","widely"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Professor Han created spreadsheets to calculate the farm's irrigation needs precisely<\/p>###

Giáo s\u01b0 Han \u0111ã t\u1ea1o ra các b\u1ea3ng tính \u0111\u1ec3 tính toán chính xác nhu c\u1ea7u t\u01b0\u1edbi tiêu c\u1ee7a trang tr\u1ea1i<\/p>

A. dominantly (adv) chi\u1ebfm \u01b0u th\u1ebf<\/p>

B. precisely (adv) chính xác<\/p>

C. relatively (adv) có liên quan<\/p>

D. widely (adv) r\u1ed9ng kh\u1eafp<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

V\u1ecb tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n 1 tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 làm rõ ngh\u0129a cho \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb calculate. D\u1ef1a trên y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 v\u1ec1 ngh\u0129a, ta ch\u1ecdn B.<\/p>","en":"

Professor Han created spreadsheets to calculate the farm's irrigation needs precisely<\/p>###

A. dominantly (adv) <\/p>

B. precisely (adv) <\/p>

C. relatively (adv) <\/p>

D. widely (adv)<\/p>###

Explanation<\/p>

The blank needs an adv to make clearer the meaning of verb calculate. Based on their meanings, we choose B<\/p>"}

childrens.title: For hiring purposes, five years of professional experience is ____ to having achieved certification
childrens.answers: ["reasonable","appropriate","equivalent","significant"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

For hiring purposes, five years of professional experience is equivalent to having achieved certification <\/p>###

\u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi m\u1ee5c \u0111ích tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng, n\u0103m n\u0103m kinh nghi\u1ec7m chuyên môn t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9<\/p>

A. reasonable (adj)- h\u1ee3p lí<\/p>

B. appropriate (adj)- appropriate + to\/for- thích h\u1ee3p, thích \u0111áng<\/p>

C. equivalent (adj)- equivalent + to - t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

D. significant (adj)- quan tr\u1ecdng<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

To be + adj…, do \u0111ó ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n tính t\u1eeb vào ô tr\u1ed1ng. D\u1ef1a v\u1ec1 ngh\u0129a, ta ch\u1ecdn C.<\/p>","en":"

For hiring purposes, five years of professional experience is equivalent to having achieved certification<\/p>###

A. reasonable (adj)<\/p>

B. appropriate (adj)- appropriate + to\/for-<\/p>

C. equivalent (adj)- equivalent + to  <\/p>

D. significant (adj)<\/p>###

Explanation<\/p>

To be + adj…, so we need to fill an adj in the blank. Based on their meanings, we choose C.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: South Regent Aviation is adopting measures to reduce fuel expenses by ____ cargo loads.
childrens.answers: ["light","lighten","lightly","lightening"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

.South Regent Aviation is adopting measures to reduce fuel expenses by lightening cargo loads<\/p>###

South Regent Aviation \u0111ang áp d\u1ee5ng các bi\u1ec7n pháp \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m chi phí nhiên li\u1ec7u b\u1eb1ng cách gi\u1ea3m t\u1ea3i hàng hóa<\/p>

A. light (n) ánh sáng<\/p>

B. lighten (v) – chi\u1ebfu sáng, làm gi\u1ea3m \u0111i<\/p>

C. lightly (adv) – nh\u1eb9 nhàng<\/p>

D. lightening (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

By + Noun\/ V-ing v\u1eady nên ta ch\u1ecdn D. \u0110\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb lightening hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i chính là gerund, có ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng nh\u01b0 danh t\u1eeb<\/p>","en":"

.South Regent Aviation is adopting measures to reduce fuel expenses by lightening cargo loads<\/p>###

A. light (n)<\/p>

B. lighten (v)<\/p>

C. lightly (adv)<\/p>

D. lightening (v)<\/p>###

Explanation<\/p>

By +Noun\/ V-ing, therefore we choose D. Now, the verb lightening is a gerund which works as a noun<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ the most challenging aspect of accepting a new position is negotiating a salary that is both fair and satisfying
childrens.answers: ["Perhaps","Outside","Every","While"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Perhaps the most challenging aspect of accepting a new position is negotiating a salary that is both fair and satisfying <\/p>###

Có l\u1ebd khía c\u1ea1nh thách th\u1ee9c nh\u1ea5t khi ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí m\u1edbi là th\u01b0\u01a1ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng m\u1ee9c l\u01b0\u01a1ng công b\u1eb1ng và th\u1ecfa mãn<\/p>

A. perhaps (adv)- có l\u1ebd<\/p>

B. outside (adv)- v\u1ec1 phía ngoài<\/p>

C. every (adj)- m\u1ed7i, m\u1ecdi<\/p>

D. while (conjunction)- trong khi<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110ây là câu hoàn ch\u1ec9nh, có \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ch\u1ee7 v\u1ecb. Do \u0111ó kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1ea7u câu ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n 1 tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho c\u1ea3 câu. Do \u0111ó A là \u0111áp án phù h\u1ee3p.<\/p>","en":"

Perhaps the most challenging aspect of accepting a new position is negotiating a salary that is both fair and satisfying <\/p>###

A. perhaps (adv)<\/p>

B. outside (adv)-<\/p>

C. every (adj)<\/p>

D. while (conjunction)<\/p>###

Explanation<\/p>

This is a complete sentence, therefore the blank at the beginning needs an adverb to modify the meaning of the whole sentence. A is a correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Complaints about its new line of kitchen appliances led Loxevo, Inc., to adopt higher ____ for assessing quality
childrens.answers: ["standards","features","risks","institutions"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Complaints about its new line of kitchen appliances led Loxevo, Inc., to adopt higher standards for assessing quality<\/p>###

Khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 dòng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb nhà b\u1ebfp m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a mình \u0111ã khi\u1ebfn Loxevo, Inc. áp d\u1ee5ng các tiêu chu\u1ea9n cao h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111ánh giá ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng<\/p>

A. standards (n) tiêu chu\u1ea9n<\/p>

B. features (n) \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng<\/p>

C. risks (n) r\u1ee7i ro, nguy hi\u1ec3m<\/p>

D. institutions (n) th\u1ec3 ch\u1ebf<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Higher là tính t\u1eeb, do \u0111ó ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n danh t\u1eeb vào kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng. D\u1ef1a trên ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a t\u1eeb và câu, ta ch\u1ecdn A.<\/p>","en":"

Complaints about its new line of kitchen appliances led Loxevo, Inc., to adopt higher standards for assessing quality<\/p>###

A. standards (n) <\/p>

B. features (n) <\/p>

C. risks (n)<\/p>

D. institutions (n) <\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Higher is an adjective, so we need a noun in the blank. Based on the meaning of answers and question, we choose A.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The chief engineer noted that constructing another bridge would be more ____ than repairing the existing structure
childrens.answers: ["economy","economics","economically","economical"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The chief engineer noted that constructing another bridge would be more economical than repairing the existing structure<\/p>###

K\u1ef9 s\u01b0 tr\u01b0\u1edfng l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t cây c\u1ea7u khác s\u1ebd ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa k\u1ebft c\u1ea5u hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i<\/p>

A. economy (n) n\u1ec1n kinh t\u1ebf<\/p>

B. economics (n) khoa kinh t\u1ebf chính tr\u1ecb<\/p>

C. economically(adv) v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t kinh t\u1ebf<\/p>

D. economical (adj) ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

C\u1ea5u trúc so sánh h\u01a1n more adj than…., do \u0111ó ta ch\u1ecdn D.<\/p>","en":"

The chief engineer noted that constructing another bridge would be more economical than repairing the existing structure<\/p>###

A. economy (n)<\/p>

B. economics (n)<\/p>

C. economically(adv)<\/p>

D. economical (adj)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

This is a comparative comparison, more adj than…, therefore we choose D<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: Jansen Bus Company drivers are expected to complete regular training ____ maintaining their state licenses
childrens.answers: ["in addition to","according to","inside","within"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Jansen Bus Company drivers are expected to complete regular training in addition to maintaining their state licenses <\/p>###

Các tài x\u1ebf c\u1ee7a Công ty Xe buýt Jansen d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd hoàn thành các khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên bên c\u1ea1nh duy trì gi\u1ea5y phép c\u1ee7a nhà n\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>

A. in addition to – (In addition to + Noun\/ Pronoun\/V_ing)<\/p>

B. according to (preposition) - according to+ somebody\/ something- theo<\/p>

C. inside (preposition) bên trong<\/p>

D. within (preposition) trong kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian – period of time<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ngh\u0129a t\u1eeb v\u1ef1ng ta có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn A.<\/p>","en":"

Jansen Bus Company drivers are expected to complete regular training in addition to maintaining their state licenses <\/p>###

A. in addition to– (In addition to + Noun\/ Pronoun\/V_ing)<\/p>

B. according to (preposition)- according to+ somebody\/ something<\/p>

C. inside (preposition) <\/p>

D. within (preposition)– period of time<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We choose A based on its meaning<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Desoto ____ all employees to come to last week's budget meeting even though only officers were obligated to attend
childrens.answers: ["to have urged","had urged","will have urged","was urged"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Desoto had urged all employees to come to last week's budget meeting even though only officers were obligated to attend<\/p>###

Bà Desoto \u0111ã bu\u1ed9c t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp ngân sách tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1eb7c dù ch\u1ec9 có các th\u1ee7 qu\u1ef9 b\u1eaft bu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea3i tham d\u1ef1<\/p>

A. to have urged<\/p>

B. had urged – thì quá kh\u1ee9 hoàn thành<\/p>

C. will have urged- thì t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai hoàn thành<\/p>

D. was urged – m\u1eabu câu b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng – S + be V 3\/ed + O+ …. <\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110ây là m\u1eabu câu even though, S1+ V1 … even though S2+ V2… Do \u0111ó ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n V vào v\u1ecb trí còn tr\u1ed1ng. Trong câu h\u1ecfi \u1edf v\u1ebf 1, ta th\u1ea5y có last week nên ta s\u1ebd ch\u1ecdn thì quá kh\u1ee9. V\u1eady B là \u0111áp án \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Desoto had urged all employees to come to last week's budget meeting even though only officers were obligated to attend<\/p>###

A. to have urged<\/p>

B. had urged – Past perfect tense<\/p>

C. will have urged- Future perfect tense<\/p>

D. was urged – Passive Voice – S + be V 3\/ed + O+ ….<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

This is the even though structure, S1+ V1… even though S2+ V2…., therefore the blank needs a verb. In clause 1 of the question, we see last week, so we choose the past tense. B is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
Lakeview Railway Onboard Bicycle Policy 

Would you like to use your bicycle to explore the Lakeview Corridor Scenic Area? Our trains have the __(1)__ need to safely transport your bike. When booking your ticket, just remember that reservations __(2)__ for both you and your bicycle. Reserve your bicycle spot __(3)__. There are a limited number of storage racks on each train. You are responsible for stowing your bike securely. __(4)__. Lakeview Railway does not take responsibility for bicycles lost or damaged aboard our trains.

questions.text_read:
Corelli's Bakery
15 Middlemass Street
Youngstown, Ohio 44515 

Dear Valued Customer,

For the last three years we have charged the same wholesale prises for our baked goods, including cakes, pies, cookies, and brownies. We regret that sharply rising prices for Our raw ingredients, such as sugar end fruit, have forced us to raise our prices by 5 percent __(1)__ August 1. We have made every attempt to avoid this price increase. __(2)__, we refuse to compromise on the quality of our products. Using the best ingredients evailable will allow us to provide the delicious desserts your restaurant guests have come to expect. __(3)__.

We appreciate your __(4)__ and look forward to continuing to serve you. 

Sincerely, 

Tony Corelli, Owner
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Corelli's Bakery<\/strong><\/p>

15 Ph\u1ed1 Middlemass <\/strong><\/p>

Youngstown, Ohio 44515<\/strong><\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi Quý khách hàng,<\/p>

Trong ba n\u0103m qua, chúng tôi \u0111ã tính phí bán buôn nh\u01b0 nhau cho các m\u1eb7t hàng bánh n\u01b0\u1edbng c\u1ee7a mình, bao g\u1ed3m bánh ng\u1ecdt, bánh n\u01b0\u1edbng, bánh quy và bánh h\u1ea1nh nhân. Chúng tôi l\u1ea5y làm ti\u1ebfc r\u1eb1ng giá nguyên li\u1ec7u thô c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u0103ng m\u1ea1nh, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng trái cây, \u0111ã bu\u1ed9c chúng tôi ph\u1ea3i t\u0103ng giá thêm 5% __ (1) __ Ngày 1 tháng 8. Chúng tôi \u0111ã c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng h\u1ebft s\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 tránh s\u1ef1 t\u0103ng giá này. __ (2) __, chúng tôi t\u1eeb ch\u1ed1i th\u1ecfa hi\u1ec7p v\u1ec1 ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nh\u1eefng nguyên li\u1ec7u t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t có s\u1eb5n s\u1ebd cho phép chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng món tráng mi\u1ec7ng ngon tuy\u1ec7t mà khách \u0111\u1ebfn nhà hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n mong \u0111\u1ee3i. __ (3) __.<\/p>

Chúng tôi \u0111ánh giá cao __ (4) __ c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Tony Corelli, Ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: Noora Abadi 
From: Alexis Palmer
Subject: Informational interview
Date: 4 February 

Dear Ms. Abedi: 

Thank you for taking the time to meet with me yesterday about careers in the aerospace industry. Your __(1)__ were helpful and have inspired me to seek additional work experience in the field before l apply to graduate school. 

I will consult the Web sites you recommended for job opportunities. As you also suggested, I will __(2)__ a membership in the Eastern Aeronautics Professional Association. __(3)__ I appreciate the information you shared about the organization's conference at the end of the month. 
Thank you again for your __(4)__ assistance.

Sincerely,

Alexis Palmer
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: Noora Abadi <\/strong><\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Alexis Palmer <\/strong><\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n thông tin <\/strong><\/p>

Ngày: 4 tháng 2 <\/strong><\/p>

Cô Abedi thân m\u1ebfn:<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n cô \u0111ã dành th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 em vào ngày hôm qua v\u1ec1 ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p trong ngành hàng không v\u0169 tr\u1ee5. __ (1) __ c\u1ee7a cô r\u1ea5t h\u1eefu ích và \u0111ã truy\u1ec1n c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng cho em \u0111\u1ec3 tìm ki\u1ebfm thêm kinh nghi\u1ec7m làm vi\u1ec7c trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c này tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi em n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n vào tr\u01b0\u1eddng cao h\u1ecdc.<\/p>

Em s\u1ebd tham kh\u1ea3o các trang Web mà cô \u0111ã gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ec3 có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i vi\u1ec7c làm. Nh\u01b0 cô c\u0169ng \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t, em s\u1ebd __ (2) __ là thành viên c\u1ee7a Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Chuyên gia Hàng không V\u0169 tr\u1ee5 Mi\u1ec1n \u0110ông. __ (3) __ Em r\u1ea5t bi\u1ebft \u01a1n thông tin cô \u0111ã chia s\u1ebb v\u1ec1 h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c vào cu\u1ed1i tháng. M\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa cám \u01a1n s\u1ef1 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 __ (4) __ c\u1ee7a cô.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Alexis Palmer<\/p>"}

A. Generosity(n)<\/p>

B. Generous (adj)<\/p>

C. Generously (adv)<\/p>

D. generousness (n)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

Your + adjective + noun (assistance), so we choose B<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
15 October 
GPO Box 985
CANBERRA ACT 6512 

Dear Ma. Wilson, 

On behalf of the Australia Wildlife Park Association, thank you for your donation of 40 AUD to our national park. __(1)__ Individual contributions have helped it stay open to visitors for more than 50 years. Our goal is to keep the park system running effectively for future __(2)__ to enjoy.

Enclosed please find a copy of our brochure, which lists various programmes __(3)__ to benefit both park visitors and our wildlife habitats. Please consider __(4)__ one of these programmes in the future. The money would be used wisely and would be deeply appreciated. 

Sincerely,

Akosua Masika, Membership Chair
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

15 tháng 10 <\/strong><\/p>

Hòm GPO 985 <\/strong><\/p>

\u0110\u1ea0O LU\u1eacT CANBERRA 6512 <\/strong><\/p>

Kính th\u01b0a Ma. Wilson,<\/p>

Thay m\u1eb7t Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Công viên \u0110\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt Hoang dã Úc, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã quyên góp 40 AUD cho công viên qu\u1ed1c gia c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. __ (1) __ Nh\u1eefng \u0111óng góp c\u1ee7a cá nhân \u0111ã giúp công viên luôn m\u1edf c\u1eeda cho du khách trong h\u01a1n 50 n\u0103m. M\u1ee5c tiêu c\u1ee7a chúng tôi là gi\u1eef cho h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng công viên ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 cho __ (2) __ trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai.<\/p>

Vui lòng tìm m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao t\u1eadp tài li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, trong \u0111ó li\u1ec7t kê các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình khác nhau __ (3) __ \u0111\u1ec3 mang l\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i ích cho c\u1ea3 khách tham quan công viên và môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt hoang dã. Vui lòng xem xét __ (4) __ m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình này trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n này m\u1ed9t cách \u0111úng \u0111\u1eafn và chúng tôi r\u1ea5t bi\u1ebft \u01a1n \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Akosua Masika, Ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch h\u1ed9i viên<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["The association grants scholarships for those studying zoology","Supporters like you help preserve the park for public use","We hope you enjoyed your visit to the park today","Interested parties can volunteer to clean wildlife habitats"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__ (1) __<\/p>

A. Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i c\u1ea5p h\u1ecdc b\u1ed5ng cho nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghiên c\u1ee9u \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt h\u1ecdc<\/p>

B. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 nh\u01b0 b\u1ea1n giúp b\u1ea3o t\u1ed3n công viên vì m\u1ee5c \u0111ích công c\u1ed9ng<\/p>

C. Chúng tôi hy v\u1ecdng b\u1ea1n thích chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m công viên hôm nay<\/p>

D. Các bên quan tâm có th\u1ec3 tình nguy\u1ec7n làm s\u1ea1ch môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt hoang dã<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Thay m\u1eb7t Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Công viên \u0110\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt Hoang dã Úc, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã quyên góp<\/strong> 40 AUD cho công viên qu\u1ed1c gia c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. __ (1) __ Nh\u1eefng \u0111óng góp c\u1ee7a cá nhân \u0111ã giúp<\/strong> công viên luôn m\u1edf c\u1eeda cho du khách trong h\u01a1n 50 n\u0103m.<\/p>

Câu th\u1ee9 nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp chung \u0111\u1ebfn “\u0111óng góp”, câu sau thì \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn “l\u1ee3i ích c\u1ee7a \u0111óng góp” nên ta có th\u1ec3 suy ra B là \u0111áp án \u0111úng<\/p>","en":"

__(1)__<\/p>

A. The association grants scholarships for those studying zoology<\/p>

B. Supporters like you help preserve the park for public use<\/p>

C. We hope you enjoyed your visit to the park today<\/p>

D. Interested parties can volunteer to clean wildlife habitats<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

On behalf of the Australia Wildlife Park Association, thank you for your donation<\/strong> of 40 AUD to our national park. __(1)__ Individual contributions<\/strong> have helped it stay open to visitors for more than 50 years.<\/p>

The first sentence mentions “your donation” and the second one talk about “the benefit of contributions”; therefore, we can choose B<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["designer","designs","designing","designed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

_ (3) __<\/p>

A. Nhà thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf- Designer<\/p>

B. Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf- Designs<\/p>

C. Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf- Designing<\/p>

D. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf- Designed<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

Ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n tính t\u1eeb vào kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho danh t\u1eeb “various programmes”, vì v\u1eady ta ch\u1ecdn D. “Designed” là quá kh\u1ee9 phân t\u1eeb có ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng là 1 tính t\u1eeb và th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n ngh\u0129a b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng.<\/p>","en":"

__(3)__<\/p>

A. Designer<\/p>

B. Designs<\/p>

C. Designing<\/p>

D. Designed<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

The blank needs an adjective to modify “various programmes”; therefore we choose D. ”Designed” is a past participle working as an adjective and expressing passive meanings.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. Nghiên c\u1ee9u<\/p>

B. T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

Please consider __(4)__ one of these programmes in the future. The money<\/strong> would be used wisely and would be deeply appreciated.<\/p>

Consider+ V-ing, và v\u1ebf sau có \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn “The money” nên ta ch\u1ecdn D<\/p>","en":"

Please consider __(4)__ one of these programmes in the future. The money<\/strong> would be used wisely and would be deeply appreciated.<\/p>

Consider+ V-ing, the next clause talks about “The money”, so we choose D<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne

{"vn":"

http:\/\/www.cmb.com <\/a><\/p>

Crescent Moon Bistro<\/p>

N\u1eb1m d\u1ecdc theo b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n phía \u0111ông c\u1ee7a V\u1ecbnh Canawap, Crescent Moon Bistro là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo cho các b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c sinh nh\u1eadt, ti\u1ec7c c\u01b0\u1edbi, h\u1ecdp m\u1eb7t công ty và m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n xã h\u1ed9i khác. Các \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp c\u1ee7a chúng tôi làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n hoàn h\u1ea3o, trong khi các \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i viên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd lo li\u1ec7u \u0111\u1ec3 cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Giá cho thuê d\u1ef1a trên ngày, lo\u1ea1i s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n và s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1.<\/p>

B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 tham quan c\u01a1 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào ngày 10 tháng 10 t\u1eeb 11:00 sáng. \u0111\u1ebfn 2:00 chi\u1ec1u. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p g\u1ee1 v\u1edbi các \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i viên và nhân viên \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c, và các món \u0103n m\u1eabu t\u1eeb th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n sáng t\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Vào c\u1eeda mi\u1ec5n phí, nh\u01b0ng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u0103ng ký. Chúng tôi \u0111ang gi\u1ea3m giá 25% cho b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 \u0111\u1eb7t phòng nào \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n trong th\u1eddi gian m\u1edf bán vào ngày 10 tháng 10 này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kính g\u1eedi: Giám \u0111\u1ed1c nhà máy ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn<\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Ban \u0111i\u1ec1u hành Sunlight Sugar<\/p>

Ngày: 15 tháng 6<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tin t\u1ee9c<\/p>

Chúng tôi vui m\u1eebng thông báo r\u1eb1ng, sau quý m\u1ea1nh nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trong h\u01a1n ba n\u0103m, chúng tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp h\u1ea1ng là nhà phân ph\u1ed1i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ed1 hai trong khu v\u1ef1c trong \u1ea5n b\u1ea3n ngày 1 tháng 6 c\u1ee7a Th\u1eddi báo Công nghi\u1ec7p \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng. Chúng tôi vô cùng bi\u1ebft \u01a1n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã giúp th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n \u0111i\u1ec1u này b\u1edfi s\u1ef1 làm vi\u1ec7c ch\u0103m ch\u1ec9 và c\u1ed1ng hi\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd.<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m thành tích này, chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n ghi nh\u1eadn nhân viên v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3n ti\u1ec1n th\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào phi\u1ebfu l\u01b0\u01a1ng ngày 15 tháng 7 c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. Các nhà qu\u1ea3n lý nhà máy t\u1ea1i m\u1ed7i \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m nên thông báo cho nhân viên trong cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp ti\u1ebfp theo c\u1ee7a nhà máy vào ngày 1 tháng 7. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã giúp chúng tôi \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ee5c tiêu c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Ella Santos [10:02 sáng]<\/p>

Bu\u1ed5i sáng t\u1ed1t lành. Tôi \u0111ã mua hai vé xem bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 Sáu. Tuy nhiên, chuy\u1ebfn công tác c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1eddi l\u1ea1i và tôi s\u1ebd không \u1edf London vào th\u1ee9 Sáu. Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n cho giao d\u1ecbch mua này không?<\/p>

Mai Tong, D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng [10:04 A.M.]<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi chúng tôi. R\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc, các chính sách c\u1ee7a Mosella Palladium không cho phép hoàn l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n. Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed5i vé có giá tr\u1ecb t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng ho\u1eb7c th\u1ea5p h\u01a1n. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 xem c\u1ea3 mùa c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u th\u1ec3 lo\u1ea1i âm nh\u1ea1c, khiêu v\u0169 và sân kh\u1ea5u, t\u1ea1i www.mosellapalladium.co.uk. <\/a><\/p>

Ella Santos [10:07 sáng]<\/p>

Tôi \u0111ã xem l\u1ea1i l\u1ecbch trình mùa gi\u1ea3i tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5i vé ngay bây gi\u1edd, hay tôi ph\u1ea3i g\u1ecdi s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n? Tôi c\u1ea7n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn.<\/p>

Mai Tông, D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng [10:08 A.M.]<\/p>

Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp v\u1edbi \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Thay vào \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n xem gì?<\/p>

Ella Santos [10:10 sáng]<\/p>

Tôi mu\u1ed1n hai vé tham d\u1ef1 Gaperstein Orchestra vào ngày 22 tháng 10.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 10:08 a.m, what does Ms. Tong mean when she writes, "I can help with that"?
childrens.answers: ["She will send a brochure","She will arrange a phone call","She can process a refund","She can exchange some tickets"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lúc 10:08 sáng, cô Tong có ý gì khi vi\u1ebft, \"Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp tôi vi\u1ec7c \u0111ó\"?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd g\u1eedi m\u1ed9t t\u1eadp tài li\u1ec7u<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý ti\u1ec1n hoàn l\u1ea1i<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 vé<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin <\/p>

Ella Santos [10:07 A.M.]<\/p>

I reviewed the season schedule before contacting you. Can you switch the tickets now, or must I call your phone number? I've already made a selection<\/strong><\/p>

Mai Tong, Customer Service [10:08 A.M.]<\/p>

I can help with that. What would you like to see instead?<\/strong><\/p>

Ella Santos [10:10 A.M.]<\/p>

I'd like two tickets<\/strong> to the Gaperstein Orchestra on 22 October<\/p>

T\u1eeb thông tin trên, ta có th\u1ec3 suy ra r\u1eb1ng cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5i vé<\/p>","en":"

At 10:08 a.m, what does Ms. Tong mean when she writes, \"I can help with that\"?<\/p>

A. She will send a brochure<\/p>

B. She will arrange a phone call<\/p>

C. She can process a refund<\/p>

D. She can exchange some tickets<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Ella Santos [10:07 A.M.]<\/p>

I reviewed the season schedule before contacting you. Can you switch the tickets now, or must I call your phone number? I've already made a selection<\/strong><\/p>

Mai Tong, Customer Service [10:08 A.M.]<\/p>

I can help with that. What would you like to see instead?<\/strong><\/p>

Ella Santos [10:10 A.M.]<\/p>

I'd like two tickets<\/strong> to the Gaperstein Orchestra on 22 October<\/p>

From the information, we know that she can exchange the tickets<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*E-mail*<\/p>

T\u1edbi: Ted Lee <ted.lee@comconnecting.com><\/p>

T\u1eeb: Agnaldo Paes<\/p>

Ngày: 3 tháng 5<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n<\/p>

Ông Lee thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1ecb trí th\u1ee3 \u0111i\u1ec7n chính t\u1ea1i Manos Cont Contract, Inc. B\u1ea3n lý l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng, và tôi mu\u1ed1n s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi. Chi\u1ec1u Th\u1ee9 Ba t\u1edbi có làm vi\u1ec7c cho b\u1ea1n không? Tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng \u1edf v\u0103n phòng \u0111\u1ebfn 6 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. N\u1ebfu th\u1ee9 Ba không thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i, có l\u1ebd sáng th\u1ee9 T\u01b0 c\u0169ng có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c? B\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 lúc nào sau 9 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ec1u phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi tôi. V\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi \u1edf t\u1ea7ng hai c\u1ee7a tòa nhà chính c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, n\u1eb1m \u1edf cu\u1ed1i ph\u1ed1 Elkton. Vì \u0111ây ch\u1ec9 là cu\u1ed9c g\u1eb7p \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trong quá trình ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n, tôi không mong \u0111\u1ee3i nó kéo dài h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd. Tôi mong s\u1edbm nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed3i âm t\u1eeb b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Agnaldo Paes<\/p>

Tr\u1ee3 lý Giám \u0111\u1ed1c Nhân s\u1ef1<\/p>

H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng Manos , Inc.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is probably true about Mr. Lee?
childrens.answers: ["He is moving to a new town","He is an experienced electrician","He has recently received professional certigication","He will be offered a job at the interview"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì có l\u1ebd \u0111úng v\u1ec1 ông Lee?<\/p>

A. Anh \u1ea5y \u0111ang chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n m\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Anh \u1ea5y là m\u1ed9t th\u1ee3 \u0111i\u1ec7n giàu kinh nghi\u1ec7m<\/p>

C. Anh \u1ea5y g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 chuyên nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

D. Anh \u1ea5y s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eddi làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1ecb trí th\u1ee3 \u0111i\u1ec7n chính<\/strong> t\u1ea1i Manos Cont Contract, Inc. B\u1ea3n lý l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng, và tôi mu\u1ed1n s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>","en":"

What is probably true about Mr. Lee?<\/p>

A. He is moving to a new town<\/p>

B. He is an experienced electrician<\/p>

C. He has recently received professional certification<\/p>

D. He will be offered a job at the interview<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Thank you for your interest in the master electrician position<\/strong> here at Manos Contracting, Inc. Your résumé is very impressive, and I would like to schedule an in-person interview sometime next week.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

http:\/\/www.mazullospizza.com <\/a><\/p>

Trang Ch\u1ee7<\/p>

C\u1eeda hàng<\/p>

Nguyên li\u1ec7u <\/p>

\u0110\u1eb7t hàng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn<\/p>

Mazullo's Deep-Dish Pizza<\/p>

Th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c bánh pizza ngon nh\u1ea5t \u1edf Chicago!<\/p>

Chúng tôi \u0111ã ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 pizza ki\u1ec3u Chicago món sâu chính th\u1ed1ng k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi Tonia Mazullo m\u1edf nhà hàng ban \u0111\u1ea7u trong m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng khiêm t\u1ed1n \u1edf Bridgeport. Ba m\u01b0\u01a1i l\u0103m n\u0103m sau, các con và cháu c\u1ee7a bà ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c làm ra nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc bánh pizza ngon tuy\u1ec7t b\u1eb1ng cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng công th\u1ee9c b\u1ed9t và n\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ed1t cà chua truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a gia \u0111ình Mazullo.<\/p>

Chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0103n t\u1ea1i ch\u1ed7, mang v\u1ec1, và d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 giao hàng trong vòng ba d\u1eb7m.<\/p>

• T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các lo\u1ea1i bánh pizza \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm t\u01b0\u01a1i theo yêu c\u1ea7u và bao g\u1ed3m ba lo\u1ea1i l\u1edbp ph\u1ee7 mà b\u1ea1n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn. M\u1ed7i pizza \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i n\u01b0\u1edbc gi\u1ea3i khát l\u1edbn và bánh cu\u1ed9n t\u1ecfi n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

• Nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i salad và mì \u1ed1ng làm món \u0103n ph\u1ee5 tùy ch\u1ecdn.<\/p>

• T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các lo\u1ea1i rau ph\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1u là rau \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, h\u1eefu c\u01a1 và t\u1eeb nông tr\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ebfn bàn \u0103n.<\/p>

Nh\u1ea5p vào m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng, s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i và gi\u1edd nhà hàng.<\/p>

Bridgeport<\/p>

Công viên Lincoln<\/p>

Edgewater<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kendinburgh Transit<\/p>

64 Ponteland Rd Kendinburgh, TD95UW<\/p>

Callum Stevenson<\/p>

42 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Leicester Girvaton, P24 9QS<\/p>

3 tháng 1<\/p>

Ông Stevenson thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

- [1] - Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi có b\u1ea1n là thành viên c\u1ee7a nhóm V\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n Kendinburgh. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ào t\u1ea1o v\u1ec1 lái xe b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh, tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên chúng tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o tài li\u1ec7u y t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt. - [2] -<\/p>

\u01afu tiên chính c\u1ee7a giao thông công c\u1ed9ng là s\u1ef1 an toàn c\u1ee7a hành khách và nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi lái xe khác. Kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng \u0111i\u1ec1u khi\u1ec3n xe buýt an toàn trong giao thông thành ph\u1ed1 và \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft thay \u0111\u1ed5i ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n vào s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe t\u1ed1t c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Vì m\u1ee5c \u0111ích này, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i khám s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi \u0111i làm. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t l\u1ecbch h\u1eb9n, vui lòng g\u1ecdi (0500) 555 0140. - (3) - Vi\u1ec7c khám c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n b\u1edfi bác s\u0129 do Kendinburgh Transit l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn và b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không b\u1ecb tính phí. - [4] - Vui lòng trình bày báo cáo c\u1ee7a bác s\u0129 v\u1edbi c\u1ea5p trên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Chúng tôi mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Kristine Yerkes<\/p>

Kendinburgh Transit<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2] , [3] , and [4] does the following sentence best belong? "To that end, we need you to complete one more task before beginning employment with us next
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong các v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] câu nào sau \u0111ây \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t?<\/p>

\"\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó, chúng tôi c\u1ea7n b\u1ea1n hoàn thành m\u1ed9t nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 n\u1eefa tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi chúng tôi vào tháng t\u1edbi\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

- [1] - Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi có b\u1ea1n là thành viên c\u1ee7a nhóm V\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n Kendinburgh. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ào t\u1ea1o v\u1ec1 lái xe b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh, tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên chúng tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o tài li\u1ec7u y t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt. - [2] – <\/strong><\/p>

D\u1ef1a vào thông tin trên cùng v\u1edbi ngh\u0129a, ta ch\u1ecdn B<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2] , [3] , and [4] does the following sentence best belong?<\/p>

\"To that end, we need you to complete one more task before beginning employment with us next month\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

We are happy to have you as part of the Kendinburgh Transit team. Prior to your receiving training on the vehicle you will be assigned to, we must first ensure that your medical documentation is up-to-date. — [2] -<\/p>

Based on the information and its meaning, we choose B<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Thay \u0111\u1ed5i ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1i<\/p>

Rolidge Motors <\/p>

b\u1edfi Nathan Kekana<\/p>

DURBAN — Rolidge Motors \u0111ã thông báo r\u1eb1ng Cara Walters s\u1ebd là Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành ti\u1ebfp theo c\u1ee7a công ty có tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf t\u1ea1i Durban. Bà Walters k\u1ebf nhi\u1ec7m Thomas Hsing, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ea3m nhi\u1ec7m vai trò này trong m\u01b0\u1eddi l\u0103m n\u0103m và s\u1eafp ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u. G\u1ea7n \u0111ây nh\u1ea5t, bà Walters là phó ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch \u0111i\u1ec1u hành c\u1ee7a Cermak & Holden Ltd., công ty mà bà giúp \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n thành m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng công ty \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t \u1edf Nam Phi.<\/p>

\u0110i\u1ec1u này \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u s\u1ef1 tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a bà Walters v\u1edbi Rolidge Motors, n\u01a1i bà b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u s\u1ef1 nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a mình sau khi t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc. Bà \u0111ã hoàn thành Ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình Lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o Rolidge và \u1edf l\u1ea1i trong b\u1ea3y n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn Cermak & Holden.<\/p>

Ông Hsing nh\u1eadn xét: “Bà Walters có c\u1ea3 kinh nghi\u1ec7m lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o và ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c n\u1ed9i b\u1ed9 v\u1ec1 Rolidge Motors \u0111\u1ec3 làm cho nhi\u1ec7m k\u1ef3 c\u1ee7a bà t\u1ea1i \u0111ây thành công”. Matilde Bekwa, ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb c\u1ee7a Rolidge Motors cho bi\u1ebft thêm: “Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi có bà Walters tham gia cùng chúng tôi. \"Công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y t\u1ea1i Cermak & Holden th\u1eadt \u0111áng chú ý và chúng tôi mong mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1ee3i t\u1eeb kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o có t\u1ea7m nhìn xa c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.\"<\/span><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the article mainly discuss?
childrens.answers: ["The benefits of a leadership training program","A successful electronics company","The appointment of a new CEO","A company opening in Durban"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Bài báo ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu bàn v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì?<\/p>

A. L\u1ee3i ích c\u1ee7a ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111ào t\u1ea1o lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t công ty \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed thành công<\/p>

C. Vi\u1ec7c b\u1ed5 nhi\u1ec7m m\u1ed9t Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t công ty m\u1edf \u1edf Durban<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin <\/p>

DURBAN—Rolidge Motors has announced that Cara Walters will be the next CEO of the Durban-based company<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What does the article mainly discuss?<\/p>

A. The benefits of a leadership training program<\/p>

B. A successful electronics company<\/p>

C. The appointment of a new CEO<\/p>

D. A company opening in Durban<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

DURBAN—Rolidge Motors has announced that Cara Walters will be the next CEO of the Durban-based company<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about Ms. Walters?
childrens.answers: ["She worked in several departments at Cermak & Holden","She was hired by Rolidge Motors after finishing university","She was a professor before starting her own company","She specializes in saving struggling"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 cô Walters?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 phòng ban t\u1ea1i Cermak & Holden<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c Rolidge Motors thuê sau khi h\u1ecdc xong \u0111\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y là m\u1ed9t giáo s\u01b0 tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi thành l\u1eadp công ty riêng c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y chuyên \u0111i ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m g\u1eb7p khó kh\u0103n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

This marks Ms. Walters' return to Rolidge Motors, where she began her career after graduating from university.<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about Ms. Walters?<\/p>

A. She worked in several departments at Cermak & Holden<\/p>

B. She was hired by Rolidge Motors after finishing university<\/p>

C. She was a professor before starting her own company<\/p>

D. She specializes in saving struggling<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

This marks Ms. Walters' return to Rolidge Motors, where she began her career after graduating from university.<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: Which of Ms. Walters's qualifications is mentioned by both Mr. Hsing and Ms. Bekwa?
childrens.answers: ["Her popularity among colleagues","Her innovations at Cermak & Holden","Her academic credentials","Her reputation as a business leader"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

C\u1ea3 ông Hsing và bà Bekwa \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1eb1ng c\u1ea5p nào c\u1ee7a bà Walters?<\/p>

A. S\u1ef1 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y gi\u1eefa các \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

B. Nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y t\u1ea1i Cermak & Holden<\/p>

C. B\u1eb1ng ch\u1ee9ng h\u1ecdc t\u1eadp c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y<\/p>

D. Danh ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y v\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách là m\u1ed9t nhà lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o kinh doanh<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

\"Ms. Walters has both the leadership experience<\/strong> and inside knowledge of Rolidge Motors to make her tenure here successful,” remarked Mr. Hsing. \"We are excited to have Ms. Walters join us,\" added Matilde Bekwa, Rolidge Motors' chairman of the board. \"Her work at Cermak & Holden has been remarkable, and we look forward to benefiting from her visionary leadership<\/strong>.\"<\/p>","en":"

Which of Ms. Walters's qualifications is mentioned by both Mr. Hsing and Ms. Bekwa?<\/p>

A. Her popularity among colleagues<\/p>

B. Her innovations at Cermak & Holden<\/p>

C. Her academic credentials<\/p>

D. Her reputation as a business leader<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

\"Ms. Walters has both the leadership experience<\/strong> and inside knowledge of Rolidge Motors to make her tenure here successful,” remarked Mr. Hsing. \"We are excited to have Ms. Walters join us,\" added Matilde Bekwa, Rolidge Motors' chairman of the board. \"Her work at Cermak & Holden has been remarkable, and we look forward to benefiting from her visionary leadership<\/strong>.\"<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

*E-mail*<\/p>

T\u1edbi: skim @ jigyeap domains.com<\/p>

T\u1eeb: larue@waterservices.org <\/a><\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: T\u1eaft n\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>

Ngày: 7 tháng 1<\/p>

Ông Kim thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

Do d\u1ef1 án b\u1ea3o trì, n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ebfn C\u0103n h\u1ed9 Jigye s\u1ebd b\u1ecb t\u1eaft trong vài gi\u1edd vào Th\u1ee9 T\u01b0 t\u1edbi, ngày 12 tháng 1. Th\u1eddi gian gián \u0111o\u1ea1n s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u lúc 11:00 sáng. D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ea5p n\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khôi ph\u1ee5c tr\u01b0\u1edbc 5:00 chi\u1ec1u. Vui lòng thông báo tr\u01b0\u1edbc cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê tòa nhà c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 gián \u0111o\u1ea1n c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 các nguyên t\u1eafc chung sau:<\/p>

1. Sau khi c\u1ea5p n\u01b0\u1edbc tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i, không khí trong các \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u1ed1ng có th\u1ec3 gây ra các tia n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ed9t ng\u1ed9t. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 kh\u1eafc ph\u1ee5c s\u1ef1 c\u1ed1 này b\u1eb1ng cách cho n\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ea3y ch\u1eadm lúc \u0111\u1ea7u.<\/p>

2. \u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 nào khác x\u1ea3y ra sau khi d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ea5p n\u01b0\u1edbc tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i, hãy g\u1ecdi cho b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi theo s\u1ed1 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê trên trang Web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi cho khu v\u1ef1c c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

3. Công nhân b\u1ea3o trì c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng h\u1ebft s\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 công vi\u1ec7c nhanh chóng và hoàn thành \u0111úng ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9.<\/p>

Vi\u1ec7c gián \u0111o\u1ea1n d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 này là c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ea5p n\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai. Chúng tôi xin l\u1ed7i vì b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n nào và c\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 kiên nh\u1eabn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Pierrick de la Rue<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kính g\u1eedi: Nhân viên Ngân hàng South Street Bank<\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: William Rees-Yates, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành<\/p>

Ngày: 12 tháng 5<\/p>

Tôi vui m\u1eebng thông báo r\u1eb1ng ngân hàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ang m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng. Nh\u1edd ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb sáng t\u1ea1o và d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng t\u1eebng \u0111o\u1ea1t gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, nhu c\u1ea7u v\u1ec1 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ngày càng t\u0103ng. - [1] - Do \u0111ó, chúng tôi s\u1ebd m\u1edf m\u1ed9t chi nhánh t\u1ea1i Leesburg trong n\u0103m nay.<\/p>

M\u1eb7c dù chi nhánh m\u1edbi s\u1ebd không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng cho \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 1 tháng 7, nh\u01b0ng h\u1ea7u nh\u01b0 nó \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ec3 khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng. - [2] - Tuy nhiên, v\u1eabn còn m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i vi\u1ec7c làm c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ea7y mà b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 xem t\u1ea1i www.southstreetbank.com\/jobs. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 nhân viên hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i nào c\u1ee7a chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn chi nhánh Leesburg, chúng tôi khuy\u1ebfn khích b\u1ea1n s\u1edbm xem xét các v\u1ecb trí tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng và n\u1ed9p \u0111\u01a1n t\u1ea1i trang Web \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê \u1edf trên. Vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 Phòng Nhân s\u1ef1 n\u1ebfu có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào. - [3] -<\/p>

Trong khi \u0111ó, ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh c\u1ee7a chúng tôi ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c phát tri\u1ec3n và phát tri\u1ec3n theo nh\u1eefng cách khác.— [4] - G\u1ea7n \u0111ây, chúng tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eed cho gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng Doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a n\u0103m b\u1edfi Phòng Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i. \u0110ây là m\u1ed9t thành tích \u0111áng k\u1ec3, m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n không nh\u1ecf nh\u1edd vào s\u1ef1 làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1eadn tâm c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Thay m\u1eb7t cho \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, xin chân thành c\u1ea3m \u01a1n và chúc m\u1eebng các b\u1ea1n.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the memo mainly about?
childrens.answers: ["A merger with another company","The hiring of several new staff","A temporary closing for renovations","The opening of a new branch"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea3n ghi nh\u1edb ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu nói v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì?<\/p>

A. Sáp nh\u1eadp v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t công ty khác<\/p>

B. Vi\u1ec7c thuê m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nhân viên m\u1edbi<\/p>

C. \u0110óng c\u1eeda t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1ea3i t\u1ea1o<\/p>

D. Khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng chi nhánh m\u1edbi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

I am pleased to announce that our bank is expanding.<\/strong> Thanks to our creative marketing and award-winning customer service, the demand for our services has been growing. — [1] — We will therefore be opening a branch in Leesburg this year.<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What is the memo mainly about?<\/p>

A. A merger with another company<\/p>

B. The hiring of several new staff<\/p>

C. A temporary closing for renovations<\/p>

D. The opening of a new branch<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

I am pleased to announce that our bank is expanding.<\/strong> Thanks to our creative marketing and award-winning customer service, the demand for our services has been growing. — [1] — We will therefore be opening a branch in Leesburg this year.<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What are staff invited to do?
childrens.answers: ["Join a local business group","Attend a celebratory gathering","Review information on a Website","Submit ideas for better customer service"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eddi làm gì?<\/p>

A. Tham gia m\u1ed9t nhóm doanh nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

B. Tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c t\u1ee5 h\u1ecdp \u0103n m\u1eebng<\/p>

C. Xem l\u1ea1i thông tin trên m\u1ed9t trang web<\/p>

D. G\u1eedi ý t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ec3 có d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

If any of our current staff are interested in transferring to the Leesburg branch, we encourage you to review the vacancies soon and apply at the Web site listed above.<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What are staff invited to do?<\/p>

A. Join a local business group<\/p>

B. Attend a celebratory gathering<\/p>

C. Review information on a Website<\/p>

D. Submit ideas for better customer service<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

If any of our current staff are interested in transferring to the Leesburg branch, we encourage you to review the vacancies soon and apply at the Web site listed above.<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is one achievement Mr. Rees-Yates mentions?
childrens.answers: ["An award nomination","A positive review in a local publication","An invitation to popular event","An unexpected increase in investment"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ed9t thành t\u1ef1u mà ông Rees-Yates \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp là gì?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eed gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng<\/p>

B. \u0110ánh giá tích c\u1ef1c trong m\u1ed9t \u1ea5n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

C. L\u1eddi m\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng<\/p>

D. S\u1ef1 gia t\u0103ng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

Meanwhile, our business continues to thrive and grow in other ways.— [4] — We have recently been nominated for the Business of the Year award by the Chamber of Commerce<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What is one achievement Mr. Rees-Yates mentions?<\/p>

A. An award nomination<\/p>

B. A positive review in a local publication<\/p>

C. An invitation to popular event<\/p>

D. An unexpected increase in investment<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Meanwhile, our business continues to thrive and grow in other ways.— [4] — We have recently been nominated for the Business of the Year award by the Chamber of Commerce<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1), [2), [3), and [4) does the following sentence best belong? "Most Leesburg staff have already been recruited"
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong các v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] câu nào sau \u0111ây \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t? \"H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các nhân viên c\u1ee7a Leesburg \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

Although the new branch will not be in operation until July 1, it is already virtually ready to open.<\/strong> — [2] — There remain, however, a couple of job openings<\/strong> to be filled that can be viewed at www.southstreetbank.com\/jobs<\/a><\/p>

Based on the information and its meaning, we choose B<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? \"Most Leesburg staff have already been recruited\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

Although the new branch will not be in operation until July 1, it is already virtually ready to open.<\/strong> — [2] — There remain, however, a couple of job openings<\/strong> to be filled that can be viewed at www.southstreetbank.com\/jobs <\/a><\/p>

Based on the information and its meaning, we choose B<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Th\u1ee9 hai, ngày 8 tháng n\u0103m<\/p>

Gabriel Li (9:10 sáng)<\/p>

Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Tôi mu\u1ed1n nh\u1eafc b\u1ea1n r\u1eb1ng Larkin Landscaping s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i Derryco vào sáng mai \u0111\u1ec3 d\u1ecdn cây kh\u1ecfi khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1eadu xe phía tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Công nhân c\u1ee7a tôi s\u1ebd phong t\u1ecfa khu v\u1ef1c này tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi nhà th\u1ea7u \u0111\u1ebfn, vì v\u1eady b\u1ea1n và nhân viên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n nên lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch tìm ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1eadu xe \u1edf n\u01a1i khác ho\u1eb7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n công c\u1ed9ng.<\/p>

Ava Abberton (9:11 sáng)<\/p>

Tôi có m\u1ed9t khách hàng, Jan McGonagle, ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1ebd lái xe t\u1eeb Belfast \u0111\u1ebfn g\u1eb7p tôi lúc 10:00 sáng. Tôi nên nói gì v\u1edbi cô \u1ea5y? Cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u01a1 s\u1edf v\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t không?<\/p>

Martin Beattie (9:12 sáng)<\/p>

D\u1ef1 báo có m\u01b0a to. B\u1ea1n có ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a cây s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn lên không? Gabriel Li (9:13 sáng) Vâng, hãy cho cô McGonagle s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a tôi và nh\u1edd cô \u1ea5y g\u1ecdi cho tôi khi cô \u1ea5y \u0111\u1ebfn. Tôi s\u1ebd h\u01b0\u1edbng cô \u1ea5y vòng ra phía sau. Các \u0111i\u1ec3m \u1edf \u0111ó s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 dành cho du khách. G<\/p>

abriel Li (9:14 sáng)<\/p>

Và vâng, Larkin \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o v\u1edbi tôi r\u1eb1ng phi hành \u0111oàn dù m\u01b0a hay n\u1eafng.<\/p>

Daniel Deegan (9:15 sáng)<\/p>

Hãy nh\u1edb r\u1eb1ng chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 phê duy\u1ec7t các thành viên trong nhóm làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1ec1 nhà vào ngày mai. Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê trong l\u1ecbch trình chính trên m\u1ea1ng n\u1ed9i b\u1ed9.<\/p>

Gabriel Li (9:16 sáng)<\/p>

\u0110úng. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Who most likely is Mr. Li?
childrens.answers: ["A landscaping crew member","A delivery coordinator","A warehouse worker","A facilities supervisor"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ai có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng là ông Li?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t thành viên \u0111\u1ed9i c\u1ea3nh quan<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u ph\u1ed1i viên giao hàng<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t công nhân kho<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi giám sát c\u01a1 s\u1edf v\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

Good morning, everyone. I want to remind you that Larkin Landscaping will be here at Derryco tomorrow morning to remove the trees from the front parking area. My workers will block off the area before the contractor arrives, so you and your staff should plan to find parking<\/strong> elsewhere or use public transit.<\/p>","en":"

Who most likely is Mr. Li?<\/p>

A. A landscaping crew member<\/p>

B. A delivery coordinator<\/p>

C. A warehouse worker<\/p>

D. A facilities supervisor<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Good morning, everyone. I want to remind you that Larkin Landscaping will be here at Derryco tomorrow morning to remove the trees from the front parking area. My workers will block off the area before the contractor arrives, so you and your staff should plan to find parking<\/strong> elsewhere or use public transit.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why will Ms. McGonagle contact Mr. Li?
childrens.answers: ["To schedule a visit with him","To obtain parking assistance","To get a list of directions to the office","To advise him of transit delays"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao cô McGonagle s\u1ebd liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi ông Li?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 lên l\u1ecbch th\u0103m anh \u1ea5y<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ed7 xe<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn danh sách ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 thông báo cho anh ta v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5 quá c\u1ea3nh<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

My workers will block off the area before the contractor arrives,<\/strong> so you and your staff should plan to find parking elsewhere or use public transit.<\/p>

I have a client, Jan McGonagle,<\/strong> who will be driving in from Belfast to meet with me at 10:00 A.M. What should I tell her? Can she contact the facilities department?<\/p>

Yes, give Ms. McGonagle my mobile phone number and have her call me when she arrives. I will direct her around the back. The spots there will be reserved for visitors only<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

Why will Ms. McGonagle contact Mr. Li?<\/p>

A. To schedule a visit with him<\/p>

B. To obtain parking assistance<\/p>

C. To get a list of directions to the office<\/p>

D. To advise him of transit delays<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

My workers will block off the area before the contractor arrives,<\/strong> so you and your staff should plan to find parking elsewhere or use public transit.<\/p>

I have a client, Jan McGonagle,<\/strong> who will be driving in from Belfast to meet with me at 10:00 A.M. What should I tell her? Can she contact the facilities department?<\/p>

Yes, give Ms. McGonagle my mobile phone number and have her call me when she arrives. I will direct her around the back. The spots there will be reserved for visitors only<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is likely to happen on May 9?
childrens.answers: ["Some Derryco employees will work at home","Derryco will be closed for business","Ms. McGonagle will stay in a local hotel","Mr. Deegan will cancel a conference call"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì có kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng x\u1ea3y ra vào ngày 9 tháng 5?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nhân viên c\u1ee7a Derryco s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i nhà<\/p>

B. Derryco s\u1ebd \u0111óng c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 kinh doanh<\/p>

C. Cô McGonagle s\u1ebd \u1edf trong m\u1ed9t khách s\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

D. Ông Deegan s\u1ebd h\u1ee7y cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

Remember, too, that we can approve team members to work from home tomorrow<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What is likely to happen on May 9?<\/p>

A. Some Derryco employees will work at home<\/p>

B. Derryco will be closed for business<\/p>

C. Ms. McGonagle will stay in a local hotel<\/p>

D. Mr. Deegan will cancel a conference call<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Remember, too, that we can approve team members to work from home tomorrow<\/strong><\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 9,14 a.m, what does Mr. Li mean when he writes, "the crew comes out rain or shine"?
childrens.answers: ["The weather forecast is probably wrong","The outdoor work will proceed as scheduled","Larkin Landscaping employs an outstanding group of workers","Derryco employees should prepare for bad weather"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lúc 9 gi\u1edd 14 phút sáng, ông Li có ý gì khi vi\u1ebft, \"\u0111\u1ed9i làm vi\u1ec7c dù m\u01b0a hay n\u1eafng\"?<\/p>

A. D\u1ef1 báo th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft có l\u1ebd sai<\/p>

B. Công vi\u1ec7c ngoài tr\u1eddi s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn hành theo l\u1ecbch trình<\/p>

C. Larkin Landscaping s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t nhóm công nhân xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc<\/p>

D. Nhân viên c\u1ee7a Derryco nên chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft x\u1ea5u<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích<\/p>

Có ngh\u0129a r\u1eb1ng công vi\u1ec7c v\u1eabn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn hành theo k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch b\u1ea5t k\u1ec3 th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào<\/p>","en":"

At 9,14 a.m, what does Mr. Li mean when he writes, \"the crew comes out rain or shine\"?<\/p>

A. The weather forecast is probably wrong<\/p>

B. The outdoor work will proceed as scheduled<\/p>

C. Larkin Landscaping employs an outstanding group of workers<\/p>

D. Derryco employees should prepare for bad weather<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

He means that the outdoor work will be done as the plan regardless of weather<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

http:\/\/www.sunriseaerospace.co.au\/companynews <\/a><\/p>

Sunrise Aerospace<\/p>

TRANG CH\u1ee6<\/p>

TIN T\u1ee8C<\/p>

CÔNG TY<\/p>

LIÊN H\u1ec6<\/p>

\u0110ÁNH GIÁ<\/p>

Chúng tôi vui m\u1eebng thông báo r\u1eb1ng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, Gh\u1ebf Suppliss, s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u trên tuy\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Tokyo-Osaka c\u1ee7a Honshu Express, d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd s\u1edbm ra m\u1eaft. K\u1ec3 t\u1eeb tháng 2 n\u0103m ngoái, nhóm thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã h\u1ee3p tác ch\u1eb7t ch\u1ebd v\u1edbi Honshu Express \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i tho\u1ea3i mái \u0111áp \u1ee9ng các tiêu chu\u1ea9n an toàn nghiêm ng\u1eb7t nh\u1ea5t. Gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm b\u1eb1ng v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u nh\u1eb9 nh\u01b0ng b\u1ec1n, giúp ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m \u0111áng k\u1ec3 chi phí nhiên li\u1ec7u theo th\u1eddi gian. Nguyên m\u1eabu cho Gh\u1ebf Suppliss \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh giá cao t\u1eeb các nhà thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eed cho Gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf Henry vào tháng 1<\/p>

 <\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi: Joseph Tama <jtama@sunriseaerospace.co.au><\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Yoshi Yamamoto <yyamamoto @ honshuexpress.co.jp><\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thông tin<\/p>

Ngày: 1 ngày 18 tháng 3<\/p>

Xin chào, Joseph, Tôi hi v\u1ecdng là b\u1ea1n kh\u1ecfe. R\u1ea5t c\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì s\u1ef1 thay \u0111\u1ed5i nhanh chóng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi chúng tôi th\u1eed nghi\u1ec7m s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t nhóm nh\u1ecf ng\u01b0\u1eddi tiêu dùng vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Các tính n\u0103ng mà nhóm c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111ã thêm vào thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf ban \u0111\u1ea7u là hoàn h\u1ea3o, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t là ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1ec3 chân tùy ch\u1ecdn. Chúng tôi c\u0169ng r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi phong cách t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3 và th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc gh\u1ebf này phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi v\u1ebb \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t hãng hàng không.<\/p>

Nhân ti\u1ec7n, tuy\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 Tokyo-Osaka s\u1ebd \u0111i vào ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng vào cu\u1ed1i tháng 4. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi cho b\u1ea1n thông tin chi ti\u1ebft vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng chúng trên trang web c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

M\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa chân thành c\u1ea3m \u01a1n,<\/p>

Yoshi<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

C\u01a1 h\u1ed9i cho thuê<\/p>

La Gardina Mall mang \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m mua s\u1eafm \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo trong khung c\u1ea3nh tuy\u1ec7t \u0111\u1eb9p c\u1ee7a v\u01b0\u1eddn c\u1ea3nh, sân trong và \u0111ài phun n\u01b0\u1edbc. Trung tâm mua s\u1eafm có các c\u1eeda hàng bán l\u1ebb t\u1eeb chu\u1ed7i c\u1eeda hàng n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng \u0111\u1ebfn các c\u1eeda hàng \u0111\u1ed9c nh\u1ea5t vô nh\u1ecb, c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1t các nhà hàng và quán cà phê. <\/p>

V\u1edbi 300.000 mét vuông không gian bán l\u1ebb dành riêng cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i b\u1ed9, La Gardina Mall thu hút h\u01a1n b\u1ed1n tri\u1ec7u l\u01b0\u1ee3t khách m\u1ed7i n\u0103m. \u0110ây là m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ebfn mua s\u1eafm và \u0103n u\u1ed1ng cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi dân \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng Bay Shore c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 khách du l\u1ecbch. <\/p>

N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c cho thuê m\u1eb7t b\u1eb1ng bán l\u1ebb ho\u1eb7c nhà hàng t\u1ea1i La Gardina, vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi Cecilia Goncalves, Qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb viên cho thuê c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, t\u1ea1i cgoncalves@lagardina.com. Trong khi h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft không gian c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng b\u1edfi nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê dài h\u1ea1n, m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi v\u1ee5 h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf (t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u b\u1ed1n tháng) v\u1eabn có s\u1eb5n. <\/p>

 <\/p>

*E-mail*<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi: Cecilia Goncalves <cgoncalves@lagardina.com><\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Marco Sabatini <msabatini @ sabatinileather.com><\/p>

Ngày: 25 tháng 3<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: M\u1eb7t b\u1eb1ng bán l\u1ebb<\/p>

\u0110ính kèm: Danh sách các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/p>

 Cô Goncalves thân m\u1ebfn:<\/p>

V\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách là ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu c\u1ee7a Sabatini Leather Goods, tôi mu\u1ed1n bày t\u1ecf s\u1ef1 quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i cho thuê ng\u1eafn h\u1ea1n t\u1ea1i La Gardina Mall.<\/p>

Sabatini Leather Goods là m\u1ed9t công ty nh\u1ecf s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t và bán túi xách và ví l\u01b0u ni\u1ec7m. S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ed3 da cao c\u1ea5p c\u1ee7a chúng tôi có in chìm tên \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch n\u01a1i bán. Tôi \u0111ã \u0111ính kèm m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 hình \u1ea3nh v\u1ec1 các m\u1eb7t hàng bán ch\u1ea1y nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1eeb c\u1eeda hàng t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi g\u1ea7n \u0111ây nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u1edf Glastonbury, n\u01a1i có hi\u1ec7u su\u1ea5t bán hàng t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t trong l\u1ecbch s\u1eed c\u1ee7a công ty. Cho \u0111\u1ebfn nay, chúng tôi \u0111ã bán s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mình \u1edf 24 \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m khác nhau, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u thành công r\u1ef1c r\u1ee1.<\/p>

Chúng tôi \u0111ã tìm ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m \u1edf Bay Shore \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian, và La Gardina Mall có v\u1ebb là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m phù h\u1ee3p. Chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n có m\u1ed9t không gian kho\u1ea3ng 150 mét vuông trong th\u1eddi gian ba tháng trong mùa du l\u1ecbch hè. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 vui lòng g\u1ecdi cho tôi theo s\u1ed1 555-0125 \u0111\u1ec3 chúng ta có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn thêm v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Marco Sabatini<\/p>"}

 <\/p>

T\u1edbi: Frieda Zuckerman<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Miles Sorrell<\/p>

Ngày: 5 tháng 2<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: S\u1eafp x\u1ebfp logic<\/p>

\u0110ính kèm: Hình \u1ea3nh<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi bà Zuckerman:<\/p>

Tôi r\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc ph\u1ea3i thông báo v\u1edbi bà r\u1eb1ng Tyche Fine Carpets, nhà cung c\u1ea5p mà chúng tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t th\u1ea3m cho các khu v\u1ef1c s\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ee3i và s\u1ea3nh khách c\u1ee7a The Pavel Hotel, s\u1ebd không có s\u1eb5n m\u1eabu mà chúng tôi \u0111ã ch\u1ecdn cho \u0111\u1ebfn sau ngày khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n là ngày 1 tháng 3. \u0110ính kèm là hình \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu thay th\u1ebf. nh\u1eefng l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn mà tôi tin r\u1eb1ng s\u1ebd phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi phong cách trang trí. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm b\u1eb1ng ch\u1ea5t li\u1ec7u gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó và giá c\u1ea3 t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng nhau. Ch\u1ec9 còn ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ea7y m\u1ed9t tháng n\u1eefa s\u1ebd khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng, tôi c\u1ea7n bà quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh càng s\u1edbm càng t\u1ed1t. Ngay khi thay \u0111\u1ed5i vào phút chót này, tôi tin ch\u1eafc  r\u1eb1ng The Pavel Hotel s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m mà chúng tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t ra làm.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n bà,<\/p>

Miles Sorrell<\/p>

 <\/p>

Pavel Hotel Open<\/p>

b\u1edfi Lavonne Coe<\/p>

(Centreville-2 tháng 3) C\u1ef1u th\u1ea9m phán tòa án thành ph\u1ed1 Mildred Simpson \u0111ã cùng ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu Patrice Snell hôm qua t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c l\u1ec5 khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng khách s\u1ea1n The Pavel \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1 Centreville, gi\u1eefa trung tâm th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n và  du khách. T\u1eebng là tòa án c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 và là n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a bà Simpson, c\u1ea5u trúc hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111ã b\u1ecb b\u1ecf tr\u1ed1ng trong chín n\u0103m qua. Gi\u1edd \u0111ây, không gian này có 34 phòng sang tr\u1ecdng, s\u1ea3nh khách m\u1eddi v\u1edbi lò s\u01b0\u1edfi và s\u1ea3nh l\u1ed9ng l\u1eaby. M\u1ed9t quán cà phê trong khuôn viên d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd m\u1edf vào tháng t\u1edbi. N\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t do Miles Sorrell thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf v\u1eabn gi\u1eef nguyên nh\u1eefng nét c\u0169 c\u1ee7a tòa nhà nh\u01b0 c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng và tr\u1ea7n nhà cao, \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t không gian \u1ea5m áp và h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn.<\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Sorrell ask Ms. Zuckerman to do?
childrens.answers: ["Delay the hotel's opening","Select a substitute item","Order some different furniture","Send photographs of the lobby"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ông Sorrell yêu c\u1ea7u bà Zuckerman làm gì?<\/p>

A. Trì hoãn vi\u1ec7c m\u1edf c\u1eeda c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n<\/p>

B. Ch\u1ecdn m\u1ed9t m\u1eb7t hàng thay th\u1ebf<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1eb7t hàng m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t khác nhau<\/p>

D. G\u1eedi \u1ea3nh s\u1ea3nh<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

Attached are photographs of several alternative selections that I believe will work well with the décor. They are all made of the same material as the previous selection, and the prices are comparable. With the grand opening less than a month away, I need a decision from you as soon as possible<\/p>","en":"

What does Mr. Sorrell ask Ms. Zuckerman to do?<\/p>

A. Delay the hotel's opening<\/p>

B. Select a substitute item<\/p>

C. Order some different furniture<\/p>

D. Send photographs of the lobby<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

Attached are photographs of several alternative selections that I believe will work well with the décor. They are all made of the same material as the previous selection, and the prices are comparable. With the grand opening less than a month away, I need a decision from you as soon as possible<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: V\u0103n phòng \u0110\u1eadu xe và V\u1eadn t\u1ea3i Optieris<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên Optieris<\/p>

Ngày: 20 tháng 12<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Nh\u1eefng c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn s\u1eafp t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng xe buýt \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón c\u1ee7a chúng tôi<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111áp l\u1ea1i ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i h\u1eefu ích c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n thông báo m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng xe \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i khuôn viên Optieris v\u1edbi các ga tàu Morbrook và Nesse. Nh\u1eefng thay \u0111\u1ed5i sau s\u1ebd có hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c vào ngày 2 tháng 1:<\/p>

(1) M\u1ed9t xe buýt th\u1ee9 ba s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed5 sung vào \u0111\u1ed9i xe c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 t\u0103ng t\u1ea7n su\u1ea5t ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 công su\u1ea5t trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p m\u1ed9t xe buýt không bao gi\u1edd ng\u1eebng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea3o trì. Xe buýt hi\u1ec7n s\u1ebd ch\u1ea1y c\u1ee9 sau 15 phút thay vì 30 phút.<\/p>

(2) M\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng th\u1ee9 hai trong khuôn viên tr\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào. Bên c\u1ea1nh \u0111i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i t\u1ea1i tòa nhà hành chính chính \u1edf phía \u0111ông c\u1ee7a khuôn viên Optieris, s\u1ebd có \u0111i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng th\u1ee9 hai \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111áp \u1ee9ng t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

(3) M\u1ed9t d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i. Nó s\u1ebd kh\u1edfi hành t\u1eeb khuôn viên Optieris mu\u1ed9n h\u01a1n 30 phút so v\u1edbi chuy\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i cùng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i trong ngày. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa cho \u0111\u1ea7u vào c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Vì l\u1ee3i ích c\u1ee7a môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng, chúng tôi t\u1ef1 hào t\u1ea1o \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n cho b\u1ea1n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n giao thông công c\u1ed9ng b\u1eb1ng cách làm cho d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 xe \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón c\u1ee7a chúng tôi tr\u1edf nên thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n h\u01a1n bao gi\u1edd h\u1ebft<\/p>

 <\/p>

L\u1ecbch trình xe buýt \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón-Bu\u1ed5i sáng các ngày trong tu\u1ea7n<\/p>(C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt ngày 2 tháng 1)


<\/td><\/tr>

*E-mail*<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Sofia Edgren <sofiaedgren@lekmail.com><\/p>

T\u1edbi: Sharani Khamis<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n \u1ee9ng viên t\u1ea1i Optieris<\/p>

Ngày: 25 tháng 1<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi bà Khamis,<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã m\u1eddi tôi \u0111\u1ebfn ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n v\u1edbi ông Rochon vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi t\u1ea1i khuôn viên Optieris. Tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ea5t vui m\u1eebng khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ecdt vào vòng chung k\u1ebft cho v\u1ecb trí ki\u1ec3m soát ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng này. Tôi c\u0169ng \u0111ánh giá cao vi\u1ec7c b\u1ea1n g\u1eedi cho tôi l\u1ecbch trình xe buýt \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón c\u1ee7a công ty. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i tàu \u0111\u1ebfn ga Nesse lúc 7:55 sáng. và sau \u0111ó là xe \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n khi \u0111\u1ebfn n\u01a1i, s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a tôi \u0111\u1ebfn C\u01a1 s\u1edf phía Tây c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m h\u1ee3p lý. <\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Sofia Edgren<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What reason is given updating the shuttle bus system?
childrens.answers: ["Optieris employees provided feedback","The current bus fleet is getting old","More staff are coming to work by train","Optieris has built new facilities on its campus"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lý do gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01b0a ra \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng xe buýt \u0111\u01b0a \u0111ón?<\/p>

A. Chúng s\u1ebd có trong 60 ngày n\u1eefa<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ed9i xe buýt hi\u1ec7n nay \u0111ang già \u0111i<\/p>

C. Thêm nhân viên \u0111i làm b\u1eb1ng tàu h\u1ecfa<\/p>

D. Optieris \u0111ã xây d\u1ef1ng các c\u01a1 s\u1edf m\u1edbi trong khuôn viên c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

From: Optieris Office of Parking and Transportation<\/p>

To: All Optieris staff<\/strong><\/p>

In direct response to your helpful feedback<\/strong>, we would like to announce a number of improvements to the shuttle system that connects the Optieris campus with the Morbrook and Nesse train stations.<\/p>","en":"

What reason is given updating the shuttle bus system?<\/p>

A. Optieris employees provided feedback<\/p>

B. The current bus fleet is getting old<\/p>

C. More staff are coming to work by train<\/p>

D. Optieris has built new facilities on its campus<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information <\/p>

From: Optieris Office of Parking and Transportation<\/p>

To: All Optieris staff<\/strong><\/p>

In direct response to your helpful feedback<\/strong>, we would like to announce a number of improvements to the shuttle system that connects the Optieris campus with the Morbrook and Nesse train stations.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What will be one change to the bus system from January 2?
childrens.answers: ["Buses will create less air pollution","Buses will be more frequent","Each bus will follow a different route","The first morning bus will run earlier"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ed9t thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng xe buýt t\u1eeb ngày 2 tháng Giêng là gì?<\/p>

A. Xe buýt s\u1ebd ít ô nhi\u1ec5m không khí h\u01a1n<\/p>

B. Xe buýt s\u1ebd th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên h\u01a1n<\/p>

C. M\u1ed7i xe buýt s\u1ebd \u0111i theo m\u1ed9t l\u1ed9 trình khác nhau<\/p>

D. Chuy\u1ebfn xe buýt bu\u1ed5i sáng \u0111\u1ea7u tiên s\u1ebd ch\u1ea1y s\u1edbm h\u01a1n<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

A third bus will be added to our fleet to increase service frequency as well as capacity in case one bus is ever down for maintenance<\/strong><\/p>","en":"

What will be one change to the bus system from January 2?<\/p>

A. Buses will create less air pollution<\/p>

B. Buses will be more frequent<\/p>

C. Each bus will follow a different route<\/p>

D. The first morning bus will run earlier<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information<\/p>

A third bus will be added to our fleet to increase service frequency as well as capacity in case one bus is ever down for maintenance<\/strong><\/p>"}

childrens.title: What bus stop will be added to the route?
childrens.answers: ["Morbrook Station","Nesse Station","East Campus","West Campus"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec3m d\u1eebng xe buýt nào s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng?<\/p>

A. Ga Morbrook<\/p>

B. Ga Nesse<\/p>

C. C\u01a1 s\u1edf phía \u0110ông<\/p>

D. C\u01a1 s\u1edf phía Tây<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

A second campus stop will be added. Besides<\/strong> the current stop at the main administration building on the east side of the Optieris campus<\/strong>, there will be a second stop to better accommodate all our staff.<\/p>","en":"

What bus stop will be added to the route?<\/p>

A. Morbrook Station<\/p>

B. Nesse Station<\/p>

D. West Campus<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information<\/p>

A second campus stop will be added. Besides<\/strong> the current stop at the main administration building on the east side of the Optieris campus<\/strong>, there will be a second stop to better accommodate all our staff.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What time does Ms. Edgren expect to get off her bus at Optieris?
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cô Edgren d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn xu\u1ed1ng xe buýt t\u1ea1i Optieris lúc m\u1ea5y gi\u1edd?<\/p>

A. Lúc 7:57 sáng<\/p>

B. Lúc 8:12 sáng<\/p>

C. Lúc 8:27 sáng<\/p>

D. Lúc 8:42 sáng<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin<\/p>

I will take a train arriving at Nesse Station at 7:55 A.M. and then your shuttle bus upon arrival, which should get me to your West Campus at a reasonable time.<\/p>

Do \u0111ó cô s\u1ebd \u0111i chuy\u1ebfn 8:06 và \u0111\u1ebfn vào lúc 8:27<\/p>","en":"

What time does Ms. Edgren expect to get off her bus at Optieris?<\/p>

A. At 7:57 a.m<\/p>

B. At 8:12 a.m<\/p>

C. At 8:27 a.m<\/p>

D. At 8:42 a.m<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation<\/p>

I will take a train arriving at Nesse Station at 7:55 A.M. and then your shuttle bus upon arrival, which should get me to your West Campus at a reasonable time.<\/p>

She will take the bus at 8:06 in Nesse station and stay at west campus at 8:27, we choose C<\/p>"}

http:\/\/www.uopine.com\/business\/bright-now-home <\/a><\/p>

18 tháng 9<\/p>

Tôi \u0111ã s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0111ón khách hàng t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a Bright Now Home l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên trong tu\u1ea7n này. D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m th\u1eddi gian r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u vì \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng cho tôi khi tôi \u0111\u1ebfn c\u1eeda hàng. Vì tôi \u0111ã thanh toán tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn nên tôi không ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ee3i \u1edf hàng thông th\u01b0\u1eddng trong c\u1eeda hàng. Th\u1eadt không may, tôi \u0111ã không ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a mình tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi c\u1eeda hàng.<\/p>

Khi tôi \u0111\u1ebfn ngôi nhà \u0111ang làm vi\u1ec7c, tôi nh\u1eadn ra mình ch\u1ec9 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t trong hai gallon s\u01a1n BN-101 mà tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t. Tôi g\u1ecdi cho c\u1eeda hàng ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c, và ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp \u0111\u1ec3 tôi \u0111\u1ebfn l\u1ea5y thùng s\u01a1n còn thi\u1ebfu \u1edf v\u1ecb trí g\u1ea7n n\u01a1i tôi \u0111ang làm vi\u1ec7c nh\u1ea5t. Ngoài ra, anh \u1ea5y \u0111ã tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i cho tôi s\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n c\u1ee7a tôi cho c\u1ea3 hai gallon. Tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 này m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa!<\/p>

Jesse Beeby<\/p>

 <\/p>

T\u1edbi: Jesse Beeby <jbeeby @ jbeebyinc.com><\/p>

T\u1eeb: Hattie Jones <hattie.jones @ Brightnowhome.com><\/p>

Ngày: 19 tháng 9<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: \u0110\u1eb7t hàng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn<\/p>

Ông Beeby,<\/p>

Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui vì \u0111ã ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n g\u1ea7n \u0111ây. Chúng tôi \u0111ã th\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng nh\u1eadn xét mà b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u0103ng v\u1ec1 chúng tôi trên uopine.com và chúng tôi bi\u1ebft \u01a1n b\u1ea1n. Th\u1eadt vui khi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng c\u1eeda hàng hàng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi r\u1ea5t thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y s\u01a1n còn thi\u1ebfu c\u1ee7a mình \u1edf \u0111ó.<\/p>

Chúng tôi \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1eb1ng sau các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m và d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a mình và mong s\u1edbm g\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i b\u1ea1n. Dù sao thì mùa m\u01b0a c\u0169ng \u0111ã g\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ebfn, vì v\u1eady bây gi\u1edd là th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn và l\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft cho nh\u1eefng công vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda mái nhà s\u1eafp t\u1edbi!<\/p>

Hattie Jones<\/p>

Giám \u0111\u1ed1c d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng<\/p>

Bright Now Home<\/p>"}
